articles.description: South Africa face New Zealand in the Champions Trophy semi-final in Lahore - follow live cricket scores, text updates, in-play video clips and radio commentary
articles.title: Champions Trophy LIVE: South Africa v New Zealand, semi-final, Lahore – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction to the last-16 of the Champions League as Aston Villa and Arsenal win, plus build-up to Liverpool's clash in Paris.
articles.title: Champions League: Arsenal's thrash PSV & Aston Villa win at Brugge

articles.description: Steve Smith retires from one-day international cricket following Australia's Champions Trophy defeat by India.

articles.description: Eindhoven is packed with carnival-goers but on Tuesday it was Arsenal enjoying their own party, setting a Champions League record in the process.
articles.title: PSV 1-7 Arsenal: Record-breaking Gunners enjoy carnival season in Eindhoven

articles.description: LeBron James becomes the first player in NBA history to score 50,000 combined points as the Los Angeles Lakers beat the New Orleans Pelicans 136-115.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James is first player to surpass 50,000 points in Los Angeles Lakers win over New Orleans Pelicans

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says her recent stalking ordeal "could have been dealt with better", but believes lessons have already been learnt.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu says Dubai stalking incident 'could have been dealt with better'

articles.description: The Football Association says Millwall keeper Liam Roberts' ban for a dangerous challenge on Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta is "clearly insufficient".
articles.title: Liam Roberts: FA wants Millwall goalkeeper's ban to be extended

articles.title: Paris St-Germain vs Liverpool: PSG's post-Mbappe era, no 'clans' & foreign stars' French buy-in

articles.description: Great Britain's Georgia Hunter Bell seeks her first major international title at the European Athletics Indoor Championships in Apeldoorn, the Netherlands.
articles.title: European Athletics Indoor Championships: Georgia Hunter Bell leads British medal hopes

articles.description: Newcastle defender Lewis Hall is ruled out for the remainder of the season with a foot injury.
articles.title: Lewis Hall: Newcastle defender to miss remainder of season with foot injury
